lines_and_colors: Above Oblivion's Tide there is a Pier
And an effaceless "Few" are lifted there -
Nay - lift themselves - Fame has no Arms -
And but one Smile - that meagres Balms -
document.title: Above oblivion's tide there is a pier
document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
